basics.name: Bal√°zs Grill
basics.label: Automotive Expert and Lead Developer
basics.summary: Eclipse tool developer with experience in embedded systems. Specialized for model-based development tools for automotive embedded applications using AUTOSAR standards. I can cover every aspect of modelbased tool development from using database back-ends to textual and graphical notations of models. Experienced in safety-critical automotive embedded software development including low-level hardware drivers and AUTOSAR Basic Software modules. Also has experience in semantic web technologies and other knowledge-representation techniques. Specialties: Using advanced model-based technologies to improve traditional software development

work.summary: I participate in several projects in the company, both in automotive and state-of-the-art MDD fields and I am the technical lead of the automotive projects.
Maintainer of the Local search and hybrid graph pattern matcher engines for the VIATRA technology.
Participated in development of an AUTOSAR Authoring tool based on eclipse and related technologies. I was personally responsible for the majority of the user interface and several core services.
highlights: I also took part in some embedded development including AUTOSAR standard basic software modules and safety-critical software components.
From 2013 I was a member of the AUTOSAR consortium standardization body.

work.summary: AUTOSAR tool development with eclipse technologies. My responsibilities covered EMF-based modelling, Graphical model notations using GEF and Persistence for large models using graph databases.

I've created software for electric and thermal modeling of high-voltage energy cables using IEEE standards. The primarily used technology were Delphi/Object Pascal and Matlab for the physical computations.

work.company: BME Innovation and Knowledge Centre of Information Technology
work.summary: Software system designs using UML technologies. Implementation of client-server systems using J2EE technologies.

education.institution: Budapest University of Technology and Economics
